name: filn0

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wne(c0, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cfil, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))

comment: The empty set is not a filter. Remark below Definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.36. (Contributed by FL, 30-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Jul-2015.)
